DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective investigation ass effectiveness transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation apply use VECTTOR reduce symptom Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy reduce impact DMD upon participant ' quality life . The primary outcome measure include : 1. increase muscle strength , 2. increase range joint motion 3. improved sleep parameter ASI , N3 REM .
DOC.detailed_description: Muscle Strength Joint Range Motion Testing - All muscle joint test perform MedCenter Therapy clinic Houston , Texas . JTech computerize test system utilized include Goniometry , Grip testing , Inclinometry , Muscle Testing Joint Range Motion test occur Day 0 , 30 , 60 , 90 , 180 , repeat 12 month determine muscular strength joint Range Motion . JTech computerize test system choose basis reliability accuracy . At test interval , test administer technician equipment participant . Inter-and intra-tester reliability JTech computerize test system subject multiple study . Each find high ICCs ( > 0.93 ) inter- intra-tester reliability . All sleep study perform Sleep Diagnostics Texas The Woodlands , Texas . Prior clinical trial , participant spend two night sleep unit sleep study examination perform . The second night use Day 0 data . Sleep , breathing , arousal limb movement score manually accord guideline set forth American Academy Sleep Medicine . The sleep study repeat 6 month 1 year .
DOC.criteria: Participants must Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy diagnosis confirm licensed physician , wheelchair bound , & age 8 20 year old . Active cancer area application treatment , infection , skin infection , pregnancy , thrombophlebitis , pacemaker , amputation part foot hand , take steroid . In addition , participant may clinical trial time study .
